name: Mauler Twins

physical_specifications.build: Massive muscular build with broad shoulders, thick arms, and a barrel chest; imposing presence.
physical_specifications.posture: Square stance, often arms folded or gesturing in sync.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Long arms with heavy forearms; thick legs with powerful thighs and calves.

facial_structure.face_shape: Blocky, rectangular head with extremely wide jaw and thick neck; broad, slightly sloped forehead; cheek planes flat and powerful; overall cranial height slightly shorter than average to emphasize width. Photorealistic skin detail over cobalt paint.
facial_structure.jawline: Massive squared jaw with near-vertical sides; mandibular angle pronounced; chin broad and blunt.
facial_structure.cheekbones: Strong lateral cheek mass with minimal hollow; shadow reads along lower cheek, not under eye.
facial_structure.nose: Broad, straight bridge with wide nasal base and slightly flattened tip; strong alar cartilage.
facial_structure.mouth: Thin upper lip, fuller lower lip; habitual half-smirk; clear vertical philtrum lines.
facial_structure.distinguishing_feature_twin_a: Small, realistic scar above left eyebrow, subtly breaking the paint texture.
facial_structure.distinguishing_feature_twin_b: Slight asymmetry in brow arch and faint crease near right eye.
facial_structure.skin_tone: Rich cobalt blue (HEX #0047AB) with matte finish; subtle pores and tonal variation; light specular edge on scalp and cheek ridge for realism.
facial_structure.ears: Small, low-profile ears tucked close to skull with minimal flare.
facial_structure.head_notes: Maintain identical head/face model for both twins; apply only subtle differentiators: Twin A small horizontal scar above left eyebrow; Twin B micro asymmetry in right brow ridge and faint crow's-foot crease near right eye.

eyes.shape: Narrow, slightly hooded, deep-set; outer corners tilt subtly downward giving a stern glare.
eyes.color: Pale steel grey (HEX #9AA3A8) with small, tight pupils for intensity.
eyes.brows: No visible eyebrow hair; heavy brow ridge formed by bone structure and paint shading.

hair.length_cut: Fully shaved, smooth scalp with faint stubble grain only in raking light.
hair.color: Natural dark stubble tone invisible under paint.
hair.texture: Polished scalp surface; subtle skin texture retained.

costume.material: Layered armored plating over reinforced synthetic underlay; matte finish with light scuffing.
costume.gloves: Matching black armored gloves with reinforced knuckles.
costume.boots: Heavy black combat boots with steel toe plating.

lighting_behavior: Neutral three-point lighting; soft key, cool fill, faint rim; lock exposure/white balance.

char_spec.instruction: Ultra-Realistic Characters, These are the Real-Life Actors/Actresses who play the Hero Characters in the Movie, they are wearing full Hero Costumes and Gear
char_spec.movement_gestures: Often move in perfect sync., Occasionally one reacts a fraction later than the other for comedic effect., Micro-difference in stance: Twin A with arms folded, Twin B with hands on hips.

voice_style.timbre: Deep, gravelly bass with faint rasp.
voice_style.articulation: Clear, deliberate consonants with weighty delivery.
voice_style.special_effect: Slight stereo separation when speaking in unison for audio realism.

char_spec.performance_notes: Maintain synchronized body language for a creepy clone effect; always position Twin A on camera-left, Twin B on camera-right.

voice_style: Target: Kevin Michael Richardson as Maulers performance — very deep resonant bass; cadence steady, deliberate; ~125 wpm; neutral American; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts; subtle stereo double not allowed — single voice.
